roleset.name: monomania, think about a lot

example.name: obsess-v
example.text: John obsesses over the smallest details.

example.name: obsessional-j
example.text: I am very obsessional to the point where I get up 20 times a night to check the locks in my house are all locked a particular way .
example.arg: to the point where I get up 20 times a night to check the locks in my house are all locked a particular way

example.name: obsession-n: All args except 0
example.text: Surely it has to be for more than some infantile kneejerk obsession with the Brave - heart movie and a unjustified grievance with highly slanted views on history ?

example.name: obsessed-j: both args
example.text: It seems that the higher class are obsessed with imitating and adopting western culture , in a sense it boosts their superiority complex .
example.arg: with imitating and adopting western culture

example.name: obsessed-j
example.text: But it is Mr. Lane, as movie director, producer and writer, who has been obsessed with *trace* refitting Chaplin's Little Tramp in a contemporary way.
example.arg: who -> Mr. Lane, as movie director, producer and writer,
with refitting Chaplin's Little Tramp in a contemporary way

roleset.note:
OBSESS-V NOTES: Frames file for 'obsess' based on sentences in wsj; adjectival 'obsessional' based on BOLT-4,5.Member of VNcls amuse-31.1, marvel-31.3. (from obsess.01-v)
OBSESSION-N NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, comparison to verb entry obsess.01, which maps to VN class 31.3-8, FN Emotion_active. (from obsession.01-n)
OBSESSED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, obsess.01. Corresponds to VNcls amuse-31.1, marvel-31.3-8. (from obsessed.01-j)
OBSESSIONAL-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from obsessional.01-j)
